name: TopDown Melee, version 1
description:
This game is  a game that is a top down shooter, my first real game, wait for better updates coming later this week, will make posts about updating this if you care, please show to me you want to see more by sharing this game, i really want to continue to work on it, also it will be dandy to make some nice suggestions to help me in devlopment, also because this is my only game im working on i will be working on this for a long while.

Controls and Explainations:

E: PauseMenu

RedBar: AmountOfBlood you are loosing, or More = Less Grey

GreyBar: Shows Overall health

Disclamer, when you start you will get hit by a random person, just die and it will go back to seeing enemys, i will work on this bug in the future.
